ComicInfo.Summary:
Under the watchful eye of original series creator Don Chin, writer Keith Champagne (Countdown: Arena) is joined by artist Tom Nguyen for a comic book series unlike the world has ever seen! Ninjas! Barbarians! Huns! Monks! Hamsters! This one's got it all! Issue #2 continues the frantic pace set by our team in issue #1 as Genghis Khann wreaks havoc among the monks and takes a few Hamsters hostage along the way! Can the team put their differences aside and come back together to take him down! We'll find out! Look for the special Hamsters alternate cover by Michael Avon Oeming (25%)! Lucy finds Master Lock and asks for his help. They start to track down the original team of Hamsters, starting with Jackie, who lives in a village hidden under Mount Fuji. Meanwhile, Khann has turned some of the new team of Hamsters to his side, and shows them a mysterious computer bank hidden under the monastery.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-14 17:57:10. [Issue ID 142445]
